title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer is storing the absolute path instead of the expected relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Navigate to a report design located in $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the included library path is stored as a relative path.
